title: wheels for python2.7 install failed: cuda 8.0
body_html:
sudo pip install https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/torch_cuda80-0.1.6.post17-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl

Collecting torch-cuda80==0.1.6.post17 from https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/torch_cuda80-0.1.6.post17-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl
Downloading https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/torch_cuda80-0.1.6.post17-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl (394.0MB)
100% |████████████████████████████████| 394.0MB 4.0kB/s
Requirement already satisfied: pyyaml in /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages (from torch-cuda80==0.1.6.post17)
Installing collected packages: torch-cuda80
Exception:
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pip/basecommand.py", line 215, in main
status = self.run(options, args)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pip/commands/install.py", line 342, in run
prefix=options.prefix_path,
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pip/req/req_set.py", line 784, in install
**kwargs
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pip/req/req_install.py", line 851, in install
self.move_wheel_files(self.source_dir, root=root, prefix=prefix)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pip/req/req_install.py", line 1064, in move_wheel_files
isolated=self.isolated,
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pip/wheel.py", line 347, in move_wheel_files
assert info_dir, "%s .dist-info directory not found" % req
AssertionError: torch-cuda80==0.1.6.post17 .dist-info directory not found

body:
sudo pip install https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/torch_cuda80-0.1.6.post17-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl

Collecting torch-cuda80==0.1.6.post17 from https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/torch_cuda80-0.1.6.post17-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl
  Downloading https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/torch_cuda80-0.1.6.post17-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl (394.0MB)
    100% |████████████████████████████████| 394.0MB 4.0kB/s 
Requirement already satisfied: pyyaml in /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages (from torch-cuda80==0.1.6.post17)
Installing collected packages: torch-cuda80
Exception:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pip/basecommand.py", line 215, in main
    status = self.run(options, args)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pip/commands/install.py", line 342, in run
    prefix=options.prefix_path,
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pip/req/req_set.py", line 784, in install
    **kwargs
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pip/req/req_install.py", line 851, in install
    self.move_wheel_files(self.source_dir, root=root, prefix=prefix)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pip/req/req_install.py", line 1064, in move_wheel_files
    isolated=self.isolated,
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pip/wheel.py", line 347, in move_wheel_files
    assert info_dir, "%s .dist-info directory not found" % req
AssertionError: torch-cuda80==0.1.6.post17 .dist-info directory not found
